column2: "Oh, It's you. It's been a while."
"Sara is off doing her own thing. That girl is hard to watch sometimes. Even more so when we're on Vopar."
"With that said, I will be the one attending to Maria today. What a nuisance you've left me!"
"Shut it, Casra. Move your hands, not your mouth."
"So? Is there anything about Sara that you want to know about?"
"1. Ask about Sara's past"
"2. Ask about Sara and Matoi's relationship"
"Sara's past... Before she met Xiao, hmm? It's not an interesting topic, you know."
"Sara and Matoi's relationship? I don't know much about that. Go ask Sara herself in person."
"What I can talk about, is about Sara's past. That's all I know."
"To put it simply, she's one of Luther's victims."
"Luther performed various experiments on her, all in order to obtain some data. In other words, human experimentation."
"Why was Sara chosen? That, I don't know."
"The research data got me so angry, I destroyed all of them when I rescued her."
"The reason he had his eyes on Sara... was because of Clarissa."
"...What do you mean, Casra? Are you involved in this too?"
"No, nope. I was not involved in it. Please stop looking at me with that scary expression."
"I've just found the experimental data that Maria destroyed. Or at least, parts of it."
"According to her detailed experimentation data, Sara was temporarily linked with the Radiant Clarissa ten years ago."
"Basically, in order to acquire data on Clarissa, Luther used her as a means to an end."
"From that experiment, a copy of Radiant Clarissa, the Ashen Clarissa II is created. Along with that, the connected body is also..."
"Miss Maria, would you mind refraining from destroying valuable equipment?"
"Oops, I'm sorry. My hand slipped."
"How must you have slipped, for a weapon to fly here with such force. Seriously..."
"Despite what you may say, I think you're way too overprotective of your pupils."
